resources.string: This is the revolutionary app for your kitchen. How do you search recipes? This app is simple to use, showing you only best of the best recipes you can rely on.\n\n First, type TWO your top ingredients which you want your dish will consist of
You will be provided with useful tips while typing. You can also try to use your own ingredients
You will have beautiful recipes, for full description tap one and go online
Vied recipes are always with you in SAVED. You can easily clean list by long click
Your last search is completely in LAST SEARCH
